home.title: TickFlow - Diverse Clock Experience
home.subtitle: A clean and beautiful web clock application that makes time display a pleasure.

features.title: Rich Clock Styles
features.subtitle: Each clock is carefully designed to bring you a unique visual experience

basic.title: Basic Clock
basic.description: Simple and elegant digital clock, clear and readable, supports 12/24 hour format switching, perfect for daily use.

flip.title: Flip Clock
flip.description: Classic mechanical flip effect, the flip animation every second brings nostalgic visual enjoyment, as if returning to the mechanical era.

digital.title: Digital Watch
digital.description: Modern digital watch style, exquisite interface design, supports stopwatch function and multiple display modes.

comic.title: Comic Clock
comic.description: Fun comic-style design, rich colors, adding vitality and creativity to your time display.

analog.title: Analog Clock
analog.description: Traditional analog dial, beautiful hour, minute, and second hand design, supports hover to display digital time.

led.title: LED Matrix
led.description: Tech-savvy LED matrix display, 6 color themes available, each digit composed of glowing pixel dots.

highlights.title: Core Features
highlights.subtitle: Providing you with a complete clock experience

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Perfect adaptation to desktop, tablet, mobile and other devices, enjoy elegant time display anytime, anywhere.

themes.title: Theme Customization
themes.description: Supports light/dark theme switching, LED clock provides 6 color themes, creating a personalized visual experience.

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen Mode
fullscreen.description: One-click to enter fullscreen mode, remove distractions, focus on pure time display experience.

multilingual.title: Multi-language Support
multilingual.description: Supports Chinese, English, and Japanese interfaces, meeting the needs of different users.

background.title: Dynamic Background
background.description: Beautiful background image support, adjustable transparency and blur, creating an immersive visual atmosphere.

share.title: Easy Sharing
share.description: Supports link sharing and social media sharing, experience elegant time art with friends.

cta.title: Start Your Time Journey Now
cta.description: Choose your favorite clock style and start a personalized time experience.

about.title: About TickFlow
about.description: TickFlow is an open-source diverse clock application, dedicated to providing users with rich and colorful time display experiences. From classic to modern, from simple to gorgeous, there's always one for you.

share.title: Share
share.text: Check out this elegant online clock app!

metadata.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
metadata.description: TickFlow is a feature-rich online clock application that provides flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and other clock styles. Supports real-time display, elegant animations, and responsive design for an ultimate time experience.
metadata.keywords: online clock,real-time clock,digital clock,flip clock,analog clock,time display,world clock,clock app,TickFlow,在线时钟,实时时钟,数字时钟,翻转时钟,模拟时钟,时间显示,世界时钟,时钟应用

openGraph.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
openGraph.description: Feature-rich online clock application with flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and other styles, supporting real-time display and elegant animations

twitter.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
twitter.description: Feature-rich online clock application supporting flip clock, digital clock and other styles

manifest.name: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
manifest.description: Feature-rich online clock application with flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and other styles

analogClock.title: Analog Clock
analogClock.description: Classic analog clock display with hour, minute, and second hands

ledClock.title: LED Clock
ledClock.description: Classic LED matrix display clock with glowing pixel dots forming each digit
